===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|骨|刀|alt2=刂|ls=ic|t1=bone|t2=knife}} – to cut up bone and flesh.

===Etymology 1===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*brat ~ prat|*brat|cut apart, cut open}}. Cognate to {{och-l|八|to [[divide]]; to [[differentiate]]}}, {{och-l|列}}, {{och-l|裂}}.

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[cut]] apart; to [[divide]] up
# to [[divide]]; to [[separate]]
# to [[distinguish]]; to [[differentiate]]; to [[discriminate]]
#: {{zh-x|區別|difference; to distinguish}}
# [[distinction]]; [[difference]]; [[contrast]]
# [[group]]; [[class]]; [[kind]]
# to [[leave]]; to [[part]]
# to [[see]] someone [[off]]
# to [[pin]]; to [[clip]]
# to [[turn]]; to [[change]]
# to [[stick]] something in; to [[bolt]]
# [[another]]; [[other]]
#* {{zh-x|不要 探聽 別人 的 事。|Don't pry into '''other''' people's affairs.}}
#* {{zh-x|既然 我們 已經 溫習 夠 了，不如 做 別 的 事情 吧。|Since we've studied enough, let's do something '''else'''.}}
# [[special]]; [[unique]]; [[peculiar]]; [[particular]]
# [[misspelled]]; [[erroneous]]
# [[besides]]; [[in addition]]
# by [[oneself]]; on one's [[own]]; [[separately]]
# [[had]] [[better]] [[not]]; [[do]] [[not]]; [[don't]]
#: {{zh-x|別 去！|Don't go!}}
#* {{zh-x|請 別 在 這裡 拍照。|Please '''do not''' take photos here.}}
#* {{zh-x|別 忘 了 在 你 的 信 上 貼 張 郵票。|'''Don't''' forget to put a stamp on your letter.}}
# {{n-g|particle used with {{zh-l|*是}} after it to express [[supposition]], often an imagined unfavourable scenario}}
